nodes.text: Vor'corkh was a Noghri dynast who encountered Leia Organa Solo, the Mal'ary'ush, in 9 ABY.

When the maitrakh of clan Kihm'bar brought a convocate of Noghri people to the Grand Dukha in Nystao, Vor'corkh spat at Leia and said that she spoke only words of discord and poison. Only when Ir'khaim and nine other dynasts chose to hear her would he grudgingly accept her revelation that the Empire had been purposely enslaving the Noghri for nearly half a century.
